name: circuits
description: A basic circom project using [Hardhat](https://github.com/nomiclabs/hardhat) and [hardhat-circom](https://github.com/projectsophon/hardhat-circom). This combines the multiple steps of the [Circom](https://github.com/iden3/circom) and [SnarkJS](https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs) workflow into your [Hardhat](https://hardhat.org) workflow.
